subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: On his high school field, Mike Catapano took the next step to becoming this year’s most unlikely draft pick, the first to be picked from Princeton in a dozen years.
snippet: On his high school field, Mike Catapano took the next step to becoming this year’s most unlikely draft pick, the first to be picked from Princeton in a dozen years.
